name: JumpingShots
description:
This game was made for the "MixAndGameJam" with the theme "Mixing Genres".

Jumping Shots is a game where the player controls a robot who has to finish the levels avoiding some obstacles, even enemies and rockets.

Enjoy and have fun. If you have any comments or feedback, you can leave a comment below :).

PS: I'll try to update this game with more levels, because I didn't have time to make more in 2 days.

Controls:
A / D - Move to both sides
SpaceBar - Shoot rockets

Music by:
https://www.zapsplat.com/
